name: Vishal Barai
title: Full Stack Developer & Security Enthusiast
bio: I'm a versatile developer with expertise across multiple technical domains. I specialize in building scalable web applications, mobile apps, robust software systems, and securing digital infrastructure.
summary: With 6+ years of experience, I've worked on diverse projects ranging from e-commerce platforms to distributed systems. I'm passionate about clean code, continuous learning, and solving complex technical challenges.
